---
title: "CensusTractShapefiles"
params: 
  inputDir: "gather/"
  thisDir:  "gather/"
  outputDir: "gathered/"
  fileStem: "CensusTractShapefiles"
---

```{r KnitrOpts, echo=FALSE}
knitr::opts_knit$set(root.dir = normalizePath('../'))
knitr::opts_chunk$set(echo=TRUE, message=TRUE, warning=TRUE, error=TRUE)
```

This module will gather census tract shapefiles for North Carolina.

```{r }
URL <- "ftp://ftp2.census.gov//geo/tiger/TIGER2015/TRACT/tl_2015_37_tract.zip"
strDownload <- paste0(params$outputDir, "Census.zip")
download.file(URL, strDownload, mode="wb")

unzip(strDownload, exdir = params$outputDir)

# Check existence of files
```

```{r Save}
allGood <- TRUE

save(file = represtools::OutputFile(params)
     , list = "allGood")
```
